projects.title: AI-Powered Portfolio Chatbot
projects.description: A conversational AI chatbot built with LangGraph and FastAPI that helps visitors navigate my portfolio and learn about my skills and projects.
highlights: Implemented conversation state management with LangGraph
Created a responsive chat interface with Tailwind CSS
Deployed backend on Railway and frontend on Vercel

projects.title: E-commerce Recommendation Engine
projects.description: A machine learning-based recommendation system that analyzes user behavior to suggest relevant products, increasing conversion rates by 25%.
highlights: Trained collaborative filtering model on user interaction data
Implemented A/B testing framework to measure effectiveness

projects.title: Real-time Data Dashboard
projects.description: An interactive dashboard that visualizes IoT sensor data in real-time, helping facility managers monitor environmental conditions.
highlights: Built real-time data visualization with D3.js and WebSockets
Implemented time-series data storage and querying
Created responsive design that works on mobile devices

projects.title: Natural Language Processing API
projects.description: A REST API that provides text analysis capabilities including sentiment analysis, entity recognition, and text summarization.
highlights: Implemented custom NLP pipelines using spaCy
Added caching layer with Redis to improve performance
Created comprehensive API documentation with Swagger

projects.title: Mobile Fitness Tracker
projects.description: A cross-platform mobile app that tracks workouts, nutrition, and provides personalized fitness recommendations.
highlights: Built cross-platform app with React Native
Implemented offline-first architecture with local storage
Created custom animations for interactive workout guides
